column4: To delete everything inside a folder called sample in your home folder it would be rm -rf /home/$USER/sample
ty kindly.  not sure why someone would want to give me a command like yoffie over there in the first place, lol -.-;
lol, no problem, glad to see you didn't erase your entire root partition :P

lol xD wouldn't have been a big deal.  it's a server comp just for my websites that i work on to host them - all my info is on my main computer too, only thing it would cause is me to reinstall the services i use / probably ubuntu in general
